name: Protecting ParaDice
description:
ParaDice is in quite a pickle: Ever since The Dice god rolled Snake eyes, people are dying like crazy and the budget is not high enough for an expansion. Souls keep coming, and one question remains: how do we fit them all in ParaDice? The answer is simple - we don't! With just two friendly (yet terrifying) statues, a magic die and a bit of luck, you can erase all those souls off the face of the earth for good!

Leave Exit inc. is not responsible for any addictions to gambling / shooting imaginary souls / praying to the almighty Dice god that might be caused by playing ParaDice.

Credits

Programming - POBIX
Lead Artist - OwenVanTable
Co-Artist, Animator, UI - GoldenGold
Sound Editor, Composer, SFX - SomebodyThePro
